description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of the Corn Exchange Regiment, 118th Pennsylvania Volunteers from their first engagement at Antietam to Appomattox. To which is added a record of its organization and a complete roster ... Illustrated with maps, portraits, and ... illustrations. By the Survivors' Association, etc" Author: United States Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9604.e.4." Page: 580 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia, Pa Date of Publishing: 1888 Publisher: J. L. Smith Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003715271 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
